review: I found Dr. Vesta on a google search and I wasn‚Äôt disappointed at all, so much so that I even brought my children for their root canal and crown treatment. She was very thorough and meticulous in her approach, taking her time explaining every little detail about the issues, which put us at ease. She was easily available on call outside of the appointments as well. Over all I had a very good experience with her as my dentist. 10/10 for her friendly demeanor, service and treatment.

review:
This is the second time I am getting a root canal treatment done with Dr. Vesta and I find it very comfortable here because she ensures minimal pain/ discomfort during the process and also she gives a very brief explanation of the issue and the corrective/ preventive measures to be taken during and after the treatment.
Also the payment was very flexible as it was structured over the various sitting through out the treatment.
